title: Persimmon and pomegranate salad
ingredients: ['60g pecan halves', '180ml orange juice, divided', '2 teaspoons cornflour', '1 1/2 tablespoons honey', '60ml extra-virgin olive oil', '1/2 lime, juiced', '7 fresh tarragon leaves, thinly sliced crosswise, or more to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '225g babyleaf herb salad', '2 persimmons, peeled and each cut into 8 pieces', '1 large pomegranate, peeled and seeds separated']
